product_name: SIGMA SPORT Lightster Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Bright enough to light your way during urban rides or commutes, the lightweight SIGMA SPORT Lightster Front Bike Light provides good light at a great value. Light features a steady and flashing mode that provides 20 hours of run time on the included 4 AA batteries. Quick release slide-and-click mounting bracket allows you to remove light from the bike if you're running a quick errand at the market. Side light apertures enhance side visibility to boost visibility in traffic. SIGMA SPORT Lightster Front Bike Light features tool-free mounting that fits oversize bars. Click switch; watertight; 2-stage battery indicator; 205g weight. Closeout.
